name: Word Lookup HD
description:
Word Lookup HD is the ultimate Dictionary and Anagram Finder for word games like Words With Friends, SCRABBLE®, Letterpress, WordFeud, WELDER and crossword puzzles.

Use it to resolve a 'challenge', improve your game, and learn new words and meanings.

FEATURES
- 170,000+ word English dictionary, with words up to 28 letters in length (as used in Words With Friends)
- Anagram Finder — enter up to 9 letters and 2 blanks and it will find all valid words (and sub-words)
- Word definitions
- FAST ! Searches and displays the point score as you type
- Useful word lists to improve your word knowledge: 2 letter words, 3 letter words, Q not followed by U, All vowels, All consonants except Y, High scoring words, WWF Tile distribution (the quantity of each letter tile available in WWF)

***
Advanced Search examples (Search Tab):
Use ? or [space] as a wildcard for one letter.
Use - (hyphen) as a wildcard for any number of letters.

Example: l??kup returns linkup, lockup, lookup
Example: -gry returns angry, hungry, puggry
Example: fi?d-ing returns finding, fiddling

****
Some user feedback:
"It's great! Definitely improved my game!" — S.R.
"Word Lookup is easy to navigate. I now also use it as my everyday dictionary. Well done." — A.C.
"Great vocabulary builder! Helps when you have a mind block — without cheating!" — R.V.
